# What is \"Pro Speed\"? {#what-is-pro-speed .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

OVERDRIVE and OVERDRIVE: Fast&Furious Edition include a \"Pro Speed\"
option that allows you to change the top speed. Read more about this
feature in this article. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
By default, your app will have \"Pro Speed\" activated which means that
your cars will be able to reach the highest-possible top speed that the
combination of support items, game mode and Commander level allows. 

 

If you feel that you\'d prefer a lower top speed, you can simply
deactivate this option by going to the Settings Menu and unticking \"Pro
Speed\":  
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

![](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d77022c7d3a7e9ae9e369/img-25345-1585280717-1671964168.png){width="709"
height="394"}

::: {.articleRatings article-url="https://support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/286-what-is-pro-speed"}
